name: E-commerce product search — terse product manager
initialIntent: We need a product search feature for our marketplace. Users should be able to find products quickly across our entire catalog.

groundTruth.fact: Users can search products by entering text keywords that match product titles, descriptions, and tags
Search results can be filtered by category, price range, rating, and availability
Search results must return within 200 milliseconds for 95th percentile of queries
Search input provides autocomplete suggestions as the user types, showing up to 5 suggestions
When no results match, the system shows related products and alternative spelling suggestions
Search ranking algorithm has not been decided yet — relevance vs popularity vs recency weighting is TBD

persona.styleInstructions: Answer in 1-2 short sentences. Be direct and minimal. No elaboration unless asked.
